# Copilot Instructions

This file contains instructions for GitHub Copilot to assist with the development of the Codea Desarrollos website.

## Project Overview
- **Name:** Codea Desarrollos
- **Type:** Next.js Website
- **Goal:** Create a website identical to the provided reference image (Klime Studio style).
- **Style:** Dark theme, large typography, image gallery.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js
- Tailwind CSS (likely for styling)
- React

## Design Requirements
- Header with logo "Codea" and nav links: "work", "about us", "start a project".
- Hero section with large text "codea desarrollos".
- Subtitle: "we help driven founders build the brands of tomorrow through websites, product design & branding." (adapted for software dev).
- Image gallery with hover effects (if possible/inferred).
- Footer/Bottom section text: "Here's how to build it" (or similar).
